title: Sanni_w
author: Sanni_w
content: For people who don't know what Metaisland is.Â MetaIsland is a 8km2 island with 8 themed locations and is a multiplayer metaverse Gamefi project taking place on a tropical island reminiscent of the series LOST and open world like GTA. The gameplay is similar to Unchartered with an engaging storyline and using blockchain technology at its best core. It is developed using Unreal Engine 5 game programming. MetaIsland creates a virtual economy where the players can own, rent, tip, spend crypto, and customize character with NFT. It also brings art into the game with high-quality music, visuals, and good storytelling.Their goal ðŸŽ¯ is to have a free metaverse where people own their assets and data with a unique participation system that rewards the best players!Â ðŸ“Œ Feel free to check out on them:Â â€¢ Telegram Group: https://t.me/TheMetaisland_ggâ€¢ Twitter: https://twitter.com/MetaIsland_ggâ€¢ Website: https://metaisland.gg/â€¢ Discord: https://discord.com/invite/metaislandofficialâ€¢ Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RiBkSzrvtEUWhat Â do you think guys?
